original_text: As soon as he began to reign and was seated on the throne, he killed off Baasha’s whole family. He did not spare a single male, whether relative or friend.
korean_text: 시므리가 왕이 되어 왕위에 오를 때에 바아사의 온 집안 사람들을 죽이되 남자는 그의 친족이든지 그의 친구든지 한 사람도 남기지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: As soon as he began to reign
and was seated on the throne
he killed off Baasha's whole family
He did not spare a single male
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 단 한 명의 남자도 살려두지 않았다
